== KTorrent ==

KTorrent is a BitTorrent client for KDE.

== Key Features ==

* Speed capping on both Uploads and Downloads

* UDP Trackers

* Port Forwarding with UPnP

* IP blocking plug-in

* Importing of partial downloads for resuming or full downloads to resume seeding

* Support for distributed hash tables

* Protocol encryption

* Bandwidth scheduling

* Trackers can be added to torrents

* File prioritizing for multi-file torrents

* RSS plug-in

* Torrent grouping

== Installation ==

* Part of the default Kubuntu installation

== Hints and Tips ==

If you want to resume a partial download, you must enable the partial file import plug-in by ;

* Click the '''Settings''' menu and click on '''Configure KTorrent'''.

<nowiki>[[File:KTorrent1_5.png]]</nowiki>

* Click the plugin called '''Part File Import Plug-in''' and click the '''Load''' button.

<nowiki>[[File:KTorrent2.png]]</nowiki>

* You will now have the '''Import Existing Download''' option in the '''File''' menu.

<nowiki>[[File:KTorrent3.png]]</nowiki>
